overview:
Zaeem Maqsood is Vice President at First Capital Corporation, a specialist technology investment banking boutique in London and Cambridge, UK.

Internet and digital media deals include venture capital raises for GlassesDirect (Index, Highland Capital & Acton Capital), MyVideoRights.com (MMC Ventures) and Reevoo.com (Eden Ventures, Banexi Ventures). Internet M&A deals include the sale of Multimap.com to Microsoft, the sale of Texperts Q&A to 118 118/kgb and the sale of Smart421 to Kingston plc.

Zaeem Maqsood’s career background includes not only investment banking, but web product management, digital strategy consulting and enterprise web development.

Zaeem is a graduate of Cambridge University, University College London and the Institute of Education in London. Zaeem holds an MBA, MA (edu. tech.), MSc (comp. sci.) and a BA (phil. & econ.). Zaeem is also an external examiner for the University of Oxford MBA and is a regular speaker and startup panel judge.
